bug.author: bhrnjica
bug.description: When creating an new mlcofnig file, the exception is thrown. And the model cannot be trained.

comments.comment: Unfortunately this is a blocking bug which is already fix in the source code, and will be deployed in the new rc version. Quick fix for this bug, could be changing the dimension of Feature 1;n in to n in the mlconfig file..
The bug fix has been deployed with ANNdotNET v1.2-rc20191602
